summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing acceptance of grants from King County's Water Quality Block Grant and QFC to support continued operation of The Aquarium Mobile Field Lab (formerly known as Puget Sound on Wheels); increasing the expenditure allowance in the Department's 1997 Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Parks and Recreation Fund therefor, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
